Module kivakit.component
Package com.telenav.kivakit.component

Interface Component

All Superinterfaces:
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Broadcaster, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Listener, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.MessageTransceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.Nameable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.NamedObject, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Receiver, com.telenav.kivakit.core.registry.RegistryTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Repeater, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Transceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Transmitter
All Known Subinterfaces:
ComponentMixin
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseComponent
public interface Component extends com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Repeater, com.telenav.kivakit.core.registry.RegistryTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.NamedObject
A composite interface providing convenient functionality to KivaKit components.

Sub-Interfaces

  • RegistryTrait - Object Registry access
  • Repeater - Message broadcasting, listening and repeating
  • NamedObject - Object naming

Naming

  • NamedObject.objectName() - The name of this object

Registry

Access to this component's lookup Registry is provided and fulfills basic needs for object wiring:

  • RegistryTrait.lookup(Class) - Lookup the registered object of the given type, if any
  • RegistryTrait.lookup(Class, Enum) - Find the given instance of the given class, if any
  • RegistryTrait.require(Class) - Find an instance of the given class, throwing an exception if there is none
  • RegistryTrait.require(Class, Enum) - Find the given instance of the given class, throwing an exception if there is none
  • RegistryTrait.register(Object) - Register the given singleton object for lookup
  • RegistryTrait.register(Object, Enum) - Register the given instance of the given object for lookup
  • RegistryTrait.registry() - Retrieves the lookup Registry for this component

Repeater

  • Broadcaster.addListener(Listener) - Adds the given listener to this component
  • MessageTransceiver.announce(String, Object...) - Broadcasts an Announcement message
  • MessageTransceiver.glitch(String, Object...) - Broadcasts a Glitch message
  • MessageTransceiver.information(String, Object...) - Broadcasts an Information message
  • Listener.listenTo(Broadcaster) - Adds this component as a listener to the given Broadcaster
  • MessageTransceiver.problem(String, Object...) - Broadcasts a Problem message
  • MessageTransceiver.quibble(String, Object...) - Broadcasts a Quibble message
  • MessageTransceiver.trace(String, Object...) - Broadcasts a Trace message if MessageTransceiver.isDebugOn() is true for this component
  • MessageTransceiver.warning(String, Object...) - Broadcasts a Warning message
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
